sentences.en: A person who is allergic to cashews may break out in a rash when he consumes these nuts.
sentences.cn: 对腰果过敏的人吃了这些坚果后身上可能会出疹子。

sentences.en: Alice is allergic to the fur of cats.
sentences.cn: 艾丽斯对猫的皮毛过敏.

sentences.en: I am allergic to cat hair.
I am allergic to in jection.
sentences.cn: 我最讨厌打针. (指过敏、害怕)

sentences.en: I like cats but unfortunately I'm allergic to them.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢猫，但遗憾的是我对猫过敏。

sentences.en: If you think you may be allergic to a food or drink, eliminate it from your diet.
sentences.cn: 如果觉得可能对某种食物或饮料过敏，将其从日常饮食中去除。

sentences.en: Its presence in allergic asthma is well known.
sentences.cn: 它在过敏性气喘中的存在是大家很熟悉的.

sentences.en: Many people are allergic to airborne pollutants such as pollen.
sentences.cn: 许多人对空气传播的污染物过敏，比如花粉。

sentences.en: Severe allergic reactions may accompany administration of the drug.
sentences.cn: 严重的过敏反应可伴随给药而来.

sentences.en: Someone allergic to milk is likely to react to cheese.
sentences.cn: 对牛奶过敏的人可能对奶酪也有不良反应。

sentences.en: Soya milk can cause allergic reactions in some children.
sentences.cn: 有些孩子会对豆浆过敏。
